channel.title: Protection From Missles
channel.description:
Also worked against magic too?
I never got 40 pray back in the day, but a few sites confirm it;
http://www.tip.it/rsc/index.php?page=prayers.htm http://runescape.salmoneus.net/rs-classic/prayer.html http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/RuneScape_Classic
Was this something that was removed early in RS1, or did it always work right up to the end?

item.title: Protection From Missles
item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

[quote=“OldSkoolRSC, post:13, topic:407206”][quote author=NoLives link=topic=508495.msg3690783#msg3690783 date=1312110031]
I heard there was a level 38 prayer that reduced the enemies prayer points through what you hit?
Heard its smite or something?
[/quote]

Thats RS2, lvl 52 smite.

I know what backs it up saying that it’s only range…

The god damn RSC Client!! The names and levels are saved into the cache what says it;s for only range not mage, maybe look at runescape classic client for this stuff before thinking it’s true

From what i can comprehend from this, ur saying look at the tool tip information for the lvl 40 prayer to see if it includes magic?

I have already stated it WAS included in an early version of RSCE, and how i first phrased my statement, im intending you to read between the lines to assume i already know its no longer in the RSCE client today. Secondaly, i never believed it was true, only that i wasnt 100% sure and wanted the community to deny or confirm.[/quote]durrr
For being oldschool, you’re thick.

Read full topic

item.title: Protection From Missles
item.dc:creator: @OldSkoolRSC OldSkoolRSC
item.description:
@OldSkoolRSC wrote:

[quote=“NoLives, post:11, topic:407206”]I heard there was a level 38 prayer that reduced the enemies prayer points through what you hit?
Heard its smite or something?[/quote]

Thats RS2, lvl 52 smite.

[quote=“RSC Botters, post:12, topic:407206”]I know what backs it up saying that it’s only range…

The god damn RSC Client!! The names and levels are saved into the cache what says it;s for only range not mage, maybe look at runescape classic client for this stuff before thinking it’s true[/quote]

From what i can comprehend from this, ur saying look at the tool tip information for the lvl 40 prayer to see if it includes magic?

I have already stated it WAS included in an early version of RSCE, and how i first phrased my statement, im intending you to read between the lines to assume i already know its no longer in the RSCE client today. Secondaly, i never believed it was true, only that i wasnt 100% sure and wanted the community to deny or confirm.

Read full topic

item.title: Protection From Missles
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

[quote=“OldSkoolRSC, post:5, topic:407206”]At what point in the duration of RSC were you lot playing that you confirm that?

Seems pretty odd that a couple reputable sites and a few forum posts ive found, back it up.

I do remember playing early RSCE, just getting into P2P pking, built a low lvl god mage pb with 40 prayer ( coz reading it at the time said it protected against magic too) too take down the def god mages, then dieing and wondering why the prayer wasnt functioning.

Oh and xEnt i heard theres a " piss off from the RSC scene then reemerging multiple times, making urself look like a complete tool and loosing any respect you had left" skill too, i hear ur lvl 99 in that.[/quote]

the fact that you think RSC had protect from magic spells means you should quit RSC and play rs2.

i don’t give 2 shits about this community anymore, i’m only visiting now and then to play mopar rsc whenever it’s out, to school kids like yourself in wilderness.

Read full topic

item.title: Protection From Missles
item.dc:creator: @OldSkoolRSC OldSkoolRSC
item.description:
@OldSkoolRSC wrote:

Also worked against magic too?

I never got 40 pray back in the day, but a few sites confirm it;

http://www.tip.it/rsc/index.php?page=prayers.htm
http://runescape.salmoneus.net/rs-classic/prayer.html

RuneScape Wiki

RuneScape Classic

RuneScape Classic (abbreviated RSC, RS1 or RS Classic), publicly released on 4 January 2001, is the second version of RuneScape (DeviousMUD being the precursor). It was replaced on 29 March 2004, with what was then known as RuneScape 2. DeviousMUD,...

Was this something that was removed early in RS1, or did it always work right up to the end?

Read full topic
